skills.name: Dreamy Invitation
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Puts the target to Sleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Recovers the Attack Bar by 50% if the enemy falls asleep after the attack.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Twisted Joy
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Replaces up to 3 beneficial effects granted on the target with Stun, Increased chances of missing, and Decrease DEF Effects.

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Night Hag's Scuttle
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Attacks all enemies to deal damage proportionate to their MAX HP and disturb their HP recovery for 2 turns with a 75% chance.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns
